snippet: More than the series win it was the nature of the victories that pleased India captain Virat Kohli most after his side completed a 4-0 triumph over England with another comprehensive victory in the final match on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: More than the series win it was the nature of the victories that pleased India captain Virat Kohli most after his side completed a 4-0 triumph over England with another comprehensive victory in the final match on Tuesday.

headline.main: Kohli Pleased by Manner of India Victories
headline.print_headline: Kohli Pleased by Manner of India Victories
